hard_initialize() - Method in class main.java.xixuan.froggerapp.views.GameView
This initializes all the relevant elements of the hard-level-mode game.
hard_settings() - Method in class main.java.xixuan.froggerapp.initializers.CrocodilesInitializer
This sets relevant parameters for the hard game level.
Specifically, this adjusts the speed and x position of the two crocodiles.
hard_settings() - Method in class main.java.xixuan.froggerapp.initializers.LizardsInitializer
This sets relevant parameters for the hard game level.
Specifically, this adjusts the speed and x position of the two lizards.
hard_settings() - Method in class main.java.xixuan.froggerapp.initializers.LogsInitializer
This sets relevant parameters for the hard game level.
Specifically, this adjusts the speed and x position of the logs and removes two.
hard_settings() - Method in class main.java.xixuan.froggerapp.initializers.ObstaclesInitializer
This sets relevant parameters for the hard game level.
Specifically, this adjusts the speed of some of the obstacles.
hard_settings() - Method in class main.java.xixuan.froggerapp.initializers.TurtlesInitializer
This sets relevant parameters for the hard game level.
Specifically, this adjusts the speed of two turtles and removes one.
hard_settings() - Method in class main.java.xixuan.froggerapp.initializers.WetTurtlesInitializer
This sets relevant parameters for the hard game level.
Specifically, this adjusts the speed of two wet turtles and removes one.
HIGHSCORE_FILE - Static variable in class main.java.xixuan.froggerapp.highscores.HighscoreManager
The name of the file where the highscores will be saved.

The highscore button enables players to see highscores board
